---
title: GitHub Copilot Assistant
description: Brief documentation for the GitHub Copilot AI assistant.
---

The **Copilot** assistant integrates GitHub Copilot into the SpecifyX project.

For implementation details, see the provider source:
[Copilot provider source](https://github.com/barisgit/spec-kit-improved/tree/main/src/specify_cli/assistants/copilot/provider.py)
